task.title: How to Compost
task.shortdesc: How to get started with composting

taskbody.context:
How to assemble a compost pile
Now that you have your food scraps, you can assemble your compost pile.

step.cmd: Find an old trash can to put the compost in (preferrably plastic)
Cut a hole in the bottom for drainage
Add a 1:1 ratio of browns and greens in the trash can

chrow.chdesc: Food scraps, fruit peels, vegetables, egg shells, coffee grounds

step.cmd: Add water to the compost (enough for it to look like a moist sponge)
